name: Shapes And Friends
description:
Shapes and Friends is a single player side -scroller computer game for everyone. Play as a randomly generated shape with random colors and fun accessories! 

Players can move up, down, left, and right. As they travel through the scrolling scenery representing different stages of life, they also encounter other accessorized shapes drifting by but their colors are hidden!!  Players must approach them to reveal their true colors, causing them to either run away or befriend players during some portion of their journey through life.

This is a short (less than 5 minutes long) art game made as a class project
